ygData.subject: Re: are there any master fletcher's on this board
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I subscribe to the list as a voyeur, only because right now I don t seem to be able to find the supplies needed to start up fletching.  Once I do find
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I subscribe to the list as a voyeur, only because right now I don't
seem to be able to find the supplies needed to start up fletching. Once I
do find them I will start fletching. By the way I play a Dark Elf, so I am
just about KOS in any good town. Verant has seen to gone out of the way and
not even given us the supplies needed to start this skill (kind of like the
enchant series of spells). Like what kind of Dark Elf even uses a bow?
(answer: shadow knight). I would love to hit something like 35pts with an
arrow.

I guess I do have a question. I have seen listed a steal bow and a ceramic
bow... anyone know where to find these or is it a not implemented item(s) so
far? or do you have to start blacksmithing and ceramic skills to make the
items? Also anyone find any magic arrows, so we can hit wisps, and ghouls,
etc?

Also, I haven't checked the entire city (again) lately so they could have
added the items and I would not know about it.

David

----- Original Message -----
From: Vytautas Dwarf/Paladin <vytautasthedwarf@...>
To: <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 10:30 AM
Subject: [EQ_Fletchers] are there any master fletcher's on this board


From: Vytautas Dwarf/Paladin <vytautasthedwarf@...>


I also belong to an EQ brewing and Tailoring board, however, those boards
are actually active. I get at least 10 msgs a day on each of the other
boards from people answering questions and sharing expertise. I have been
on this board for a week and have only received 2 msgs (which it seems I am
the only one who answered them) and have received no replies regarding my
own post a few days ago about fletching past 160. Are there any Master
fletcher on this board and why is everyone so quiet?
